name: df-fin2
body: |- wceq(cfin2, cab(s0, wral(s1, cpw(cpw(cv(s0))), wi(wa(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wor(crpss, cv(s1))), wcel(cuni(cv(s1)), cv(s1))))))
comment: A set is II-finite (Tarski finite) iff every nonempty chain of subsets contains a maximum element. Definition II of [Levy58] p. 2. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Nov-2014.)
